text:
Punjab Chief Minister Parkash Singh Badal on Thursday ordered ban on manufacture of food products containing tobacco or nicotine like ‘gutkha’ and ‘pan masala’ in the State with immediate effect.

Mr. Badal has asked the Health Department to take immediate steps to ensure complete ban on manufacturing of ‘guthka’, ‘pan masala’, processed/ flavoured chewing tobacco and any other food products containing tobacco or nicotine in the State, a spokesperson said. - PTI
title: Punjab bans gutkha manufacture
